alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Niagara; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 31 at 9:49PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF LAKE EFFECT SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHAUTAUQUA... CATTARAUGUS...SOUTHERN ERIE...NIAGARA...AND NORTHERN ERIE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of lake effect snow will rapidly reduce visibility to less than one half mile. Most roads will remain wet, but roads will briefly become snow and slush covered where the snow is heaviest. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Buffalo, Cheektowaga, West Seneca, North Tonawanda, Clarence, Lockport, Lackawanna, Kenmore, Depew, Amherst, Tonawanda, Dunkirk, Fredonia, Lancaster, Hamburg, East Aurora, Williamsville, Grand Island, Evans, and Elma. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 49 and 61, Interstate 190 near Buffalo, Interstate 990, Route 219, and Route 400. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Niagara; Northern Erie; Southern Erie
